name: Retro Shot - Pinball Puzzle Game
description:
Lasers! Explosions! Synthwave!

In the world of neon lights awaits the 80s experience of the year! Retro Shot combines pinball with minigolf like no other mobile game before. Smash yourself through dangerous tron-like levels full of mines, bumpers, mazes, teleports, fans and did we mention lasers already?

FEATURES
● 80 levels of pinball action
● 4 worlds to dominate: Laser Town, Technopolis, Sunset Beach and Volcano Islands
● 24 balls to collect and play
● Slingshot to the top of a global pool of players
● Challenging physics and geometry puzzles
● Exclusive synthwave soundtrack

* Please note: an iPhone 5 or iPad 3rd generation is recommended to properly run Retro Shot!
